name: install_safety_devices_days
title: Within how many days after Acceptance will required Safety Devices need to be installed and documented by the seller?
label: Safety Devices Days
description: This includes required smoke alarms, CO detectors, and water heater bracing.
tips: This requirement is important but often overlooked. Also make sure that safety devices meet current building code requirements.
small_print: Documentation of proper installation must be provided by the seller within the specified timeframe. Written notification with photographs of completion is strongly encouraged.

internal.notes: Days to install and document safety devices

install_safety_devices_days.name: install_safety_devices_days

suggested.hint: The seller should provide this within 5-7 days after offer acceptance.
